decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive plays by using low-cost creatures like Vein Ripper and Bloodtithe Harvester to pressure opponents early on. With removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, it aims to control the board while utilizing powerful creatures like Kroxa, Titan of Death's Hunger and Sheoldred, the Apocalypse for additional threats. The inclusion of Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord helps buff up creatures and provide lifelink. The deck also includes hand disruption with cards like Duress and utilizes lands like Mutavault and Hive of the Eye Tyrant for added versatility in combat.

The deck revolves around utilizing Lotus Field to generate a large amount of mana quickly in order to cast powerful spells and combo off. It includes cards like Thespian's Stage, Hidden Strings, and Pore Over the Pages to help ramp and draw cards, while also running cards like Emergent Ultimatum and Fae of Wishes to search for win conditions. The deck also includes control elements like Strict Proctor and Archdruid's Charm to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The goal is to set up a board state where you can overwhelm your opponent with powerful spells and win the game quickly.
